channel.title: Macosx - F5 (key) to toggle patches Live
channel.description:
Just hit this one key (i choose F5) to toogle patches Live; only one finger ;-)
Apple script
tell application "System Events" tell application "Axoloti" to activate keystroke "e" using {command down} end tell
Let me know if anyone want a detailed step thru

item.title: Macosx - F5 (key) to toggle patches Live
item.dc:creator: @keyman Antonio Machado
item.description:

Just hit this one key (i choose F5) to toogle patches Live; only one finger

Apple script

tell application "Axoloti" to activate
keystroke "e" using {command down}
end tell

Let me know if anyone want a detailed step thru
